title: Foreign Secretary Dominic Raab to take over Boris Johnson’s duties while PM in ICU - The Globe and Mail
description: Foreign Secretary Dominic Raab to take over Boris Johnson’s duties while PM in ICU The Globe and Mail British PM Boris Johnson in intensive care due to coronavirus symptoms Global News What Boris Johnson's move into intensive care means CBC News We wish the P…
content: by Monday evening officials said the Prime Minister had taken a turn for the worse, and 'on the advice of his medical team, he has been moved to the intensive care unit at the hospital,' a statement from Downing Street said St Thomas' Hospital seen here on Ap… [+5566 chars]
